text: Gumazim nɨghnɨgh suam, a gɨn aremegham, egh suam gumazir manam an biziba iniam, egh an akɨnafarim osirigham. Kar mati an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim. Eghtɨ borim Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kamɨn gɨn mangɨ, egh afeziam a ginabazir biziba iniam. Eghtɨ gumaziba deragh fogh suam, afeziam aremegha gɨfa, egh me biziba bar an borimɨn tegham.
